title: Pennsylvania State Senator Daylin Leach Calls Donald Trump ‚ÄòFascist, Loofah-Faced S--t-Gibbon‚Äô: Best Memes
text:
Celebs Reluctant to Attend Trump‚Äôs White House Correspondents‚Äô Dinner 
The trouble started when Trump, 70, remarked he wants to ‚Äúdestroy‚Äù the career of a Texas lawmaker who wants to rein in civil asset forfeiture, a practice that allows law enforcement officials to seize the cash or property of individuals suspected of committing a crime without a guilty sentence. PHOTOS: Donald Trump's Most Offensive and Outrageous Quotes Ranked 
According to Politico , Rockwall County, Texas, Sheriff Harold Eavenson told the president during a listening session Tuesday, ‚ÄúOn asset forfeiture, we‚Äôve got a state senator in Texas that was talking about introducing legislation to require conviction before we could receive that forfeiture money.‚Äù 
Trump seemed to side with Eavenson, reportedly replying, ‚ÄúCan you believe that? ‚Ä¶ Who is the state senator? Do you want to give his name? We‚Äôll destroy his career.‚Äù 
Politico reports that the sheriffs gathered in the room erupted in laughter at this suggestion, though Trump did not join in. Eavenson did not mention the lawmaker by name. PHOTOS: Celebs Fight Back on Twitter! 
When Leach caught wind of the reported exchange, he posted the article to his Facebook wall , along with a few thoughts of his own as he took aim at Trump. ‚ÄúHey! I oppose civil asset forfeiture too,‚Äù he wrote. ‚ÄúWhy don‚Äôt you come after me you racist, loofa-faced s--t-gibbon!!‚Äù Donald Trump speaks as he meets with county sheriffs during a listening session in the Roosevelt Room of the White House in Washington, D.C., U.S., on Tuesday, Feb. 7, 2017. Andrew Harrer/Bloomberg via Getty Images 
The post immediately went viral, with social media latching onto the bizarre insult. Urban Dictionary already has an entry defining ‚Äús--t-gibbon‚Äù as a ‚Äúgeneral insult ‚Ä¶ moron, idiot, Donald Trump in particular.‚Äù . @realDonaldTrump , a lot of people have tried to end @daylinleach 's career. They failed. So will you. pic.twitter.com/I0IePZfyki ‚Äî Steve Hoenstine (@stevehoenstine) February 8, 2017 If Trump were here right now I would definitely fling my feces at him. #shitgibbon @daylinleach #ResistTrump pic.twitter.com/9D6svK6jNs ‚Äî Shit Gibbon (@LoofaFace) February 8, 2017 #PresidentBannon - Don't let Donny online tonight. People are making fun of him. Calling him #ShitGibbon and stuff. He might get sad. üò° Her: Bad day at work?Senator: ...I mean, It was okay...Her: Well, the lasagna is about done..Him: I called the President a shit gibbon ‚Äî Sean Phipps (@SeanMPhipps) February 8, 2017 BREAKING: U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service adds shitgibbon to its protected species list.
